channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Weather system in southern Caribbean expected to strengthen and head northward this week
item.description: A weather system in the south-central Caribbean is expected to develop and strengthen this week, prompting a tropical storm warning for Jamaica and a hurricane watch for the Cayman Islands.

item.title: AP Top 25: Oregon a unanimous No. 1 ahead of 1st CFP rankings, followed by Georgia, Ohio State
item.description: Oregon is a unanimous choice for No. 1 in The Associated Press college football poll. The Ducks hope to also be in the top spot in the College Football Playoff selection committee’s first rankings of the season on Tuesday.

item.title: Harris won’t say how she voted on California measure that would reverse criminal justice reforms
item.description: Vice President Kamala Harris won’t say how she voted on a ballot measure in her home state of California that would reverse criminal justice reforms approved in recent years.
